p: In this paper, we described the pharmaceutical activity of 13 phytochemicals and 17 medicinal plants, including those used by centuries for the Traditional Chinese Medicine. All these natural compounds are able to interact with multiple biological processes, resulting in the alleviation of endometriosis-related complaints. However, future human randomized clinical trials would be helpful in order to achieve more conclusive results about the efficiency of herbal medicine as alternative therapy in endometriosis.
